tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: In this @amdipstories podcast episode, #FSI Dean Lizzie Slater shares what happened when a truck bomb detonated 50 ft from her at U.S. Embassy Dar es Salaam. Listen to her story of resilience, determination, & how this event shaped the rest of her career. bit.ly/362cYV3
